statements: SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, merchant, customer_id FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT transaction_id, merchant, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE is_fraudulent = true;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, amount, merchant FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND is_fraudulent = TRUE ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT DISTINCT merchant FROM financial_transactions WHERE is_fraudulent = FALSE ORDER BY merchant
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND transaction_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT model_id, model_name FROM machine_learning_models WHERE model_accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT model_id, model_name, model_accuracy FROM machine_learning_models ORDER BY model_accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE fraud_score >= 90;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, fraud_score FROM financial_transactions WHERE fraud_score > 80 ORDER BY transaction_id;
SELECT model_name, model_accuracy FROM machine_learning_models WHERE model_accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY model_accuracy DESC;
SELECT model_id, model_name, last_trained FROM machine_learning_models WHERE last_trained BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT * FROM financial_transactions f JOIN machine_learning_models m ON f.transaction_id = m.model_id WHERE f.transaction_amount < 500 AND m.model_accuracy > 0.75 ORDER BY f.transaction_id ASC, m.model_accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT customer_id, amount, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions WHERE is_fraud = TRUE;
SELECT model_name, algorithm FROM machine_learning_models WHERE accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, model_id, prediction_result FROM fraud_detection_logs WHERE prediction_result = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT model_name, algorithm, accuracy FROM machine_learning_models WHERE accuracy > 0.7 ORDER BY accuracy DESC
SELECT transaction_id, model_id, prediction_result FROM fraud_detection_logs WHERE prediction_result = true ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT f.transaction_id, f.amount, m.model_name, l.prediction_result FROM financial_transactions f JOIN machine_learning_models m ON f.customer_id = m.model_id JOIN fraud_detection_logs l ON f.transaction_id = l.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions WHERE fraud_flag = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM transaction_categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions WHERE fraud_flag = true ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT category_name, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transaction_categories JOIN financial_transactions ON transaction_categories.category_id = financial_transactions.customer_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY total_transactions DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT customer_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN financial_transactions ON customers.customer_id = financial_transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT log_timestamp, log_message FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions
SELECT full_name, email, age FROM users
SELECT * FROM credit_cards WHERE card_type='Visa'
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description FROM fraud_patterns
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT full_name, email, age FROM users WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT card_number, card_type FROM credit_cards WHERE user_id = 201 AND card_type = 'Visa';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE fraud_flag = TRUE AND amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT model_name, model_type, trained_date FROM ml_models WHERE accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY trained_date ASC;
